sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <!--COMMENTS SECTION-->
    <v-row rows="12">
      <v-col cols="2"></v-col>
      <v-col cols="12" v-for="commentEl in comments" :key="commentEl.id">
        <CommentCard
          style="background-color: lightgray; margin-left: 5px"
          :post="commentEl"
        />
        <v-btn @click="deleteComments(commentEl.id)">Delete</v-btn>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="2"></v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import PostService from "@/services/PostService";
import CommentCard from "@/components/CommentCard";

export default {
  components: {
    CommentCard,
  },
  props: {
    content: String,
    post: Object,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      comments: [],
      editMode: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async deleteComments(id) {
      console.log(this.comments, id);
      let res = await PostService.deleteComment(id);
      console.log(res);
    },
  },
  async created() {
    let id = this.$route.params.id;
    this.comments = await PostService.getCommentById(id);
  },
};
</script>
